p: To determine the anti-melanogenic activity of PPEO, we evaluated its effect on TYR activity and melanin content in B16 melanoma cells. The B16 melanoma cells were treated with various concentrations of PPEO and then co-cultured for 72 h. As shown in Figure 5, PPEO dose-dependently inhibited TYR activity and melanin content. At a concentration of 50 μg/mL, melanin synthesis and TYR activity were inhibited by 48.28% and 64.54%, respectively, and the IC 50 of melanin synthesis in inhibition was 67.64 μg/mL. Kojic acid, the positive control, inhibited TYR activity by 62.09%, which is similar to the inhibitory effect of PPEO at 50 μg/mL ( Figure 5B).
